name: Dice Merge Pro
description:
[Game introduction]
Dice Merge Pro: Random dice,Combine the same dice with new dice in your way,Easy to play, but it is a game that can make you addicted!

Download this game to give your brain a rest and exercise.

This is a mobile game suitable for playing in fragmental time, suitable for players of all ages, random dice with different Numbers to make it more exciting to solve!

Combine dice at will. In this dice game, you can rotate the dice, match three or more dice, and then combine dice. The difficulty will increase gradually as the game goes on, and you will find: Wow!I'm so smart!


The game will have random dice with different points. The bigger the random dice you combine and collect, the higher the score you get.

Try it, and you'll love dice Merge Pro.

[Game Tips]
1:Rotate random dice.
2:Place the dice on a 5 by 5 board.
3:Match three or more dice of the same number, the dice will merge and you get a score.
4:If there is no room for dice, the game is over!

[Game Features]
1:Beautiful colored dice.
2:A refreshing game experience.
3:Easy to understand operation.
4:Good luck with your clearance props.
5:No time limit, no Internet.
6:Absolutely free.

Dice Merge Pro: A random dice merge game that trains your analytical thinking skills because it takes real skill to set the highest score.
Are you ready?
We really hope you enjoy playing games!
